abstract: Rain affected the American League Championship Series more than it did the Texas State Fair, and Rangers catcher Mike Napoli has ailing knees to go with his ailing ribs.
snippet: Rain affected the American League Championship Series more than it did the Texas State Fair, and Rangers catcher Mike Napoli has ailing knees to go with his ailing ribs.
lead_paragraph: Through the baseball playoffs, Mike Tanier will provide the Bats blog with daily updates on less-than-important developments from around the league. His Phillies homerism is no longer an issue.

headline.main: A Texas Rainout, but Not for the State Fair
